description_text:
Hello,

I just wanted to let you know that the Plus X pedal set I received today. I
was hoping to get a refund for it. Do you have any instructions on how I
can start that process?

Thank you

conversations.body_text:
Evening,

A couple days I asked about canceling a delivery but I never got a
response. I assume my package will come before you can process a
cancellation. Is it possible that I am sent the information necessary to
process a refund so that once it arrives I can quickly return it?

Thank you,
Griffin

---------- Forwarded message ---------
ID 为 9326 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单9326  
      主题: Cancel Delivery  
      描述:  Evening,   
 Yesterday I ordered the the Plus X 2-Pedal set without a baseplate. After some thinking, I've decided I do not need this and would like to cancel my order. 
   
 My order number is Order #SSN5356 and the email attached to my order is the same as the one I am using right now. 
   
 Thank you, 
 Griffin
Hi Griffin Price,  Please provide your order number. Due to the high cost of international shipping, we currently do not support refunds without a valid reason. Thank you for your understanding.

Hi,

I would like to return the product because I no longer want it.

However, I'm unsure what constitutes a valid reason for a refund. Based on
my understanding, when I purchased the product, there was a mutual
agreement that a refund would be granted as long as the conditions outlined
in the screenshot were met.




It would be a bit disappointing if my refund request wasn't approved. I
bought the product thinking I could get a refund within 30 days.

Thank you

Sorry I forgot to include the order number, #SSN5356.

Thank you

On Wed, Jan 7, 2026, 17:27 Griffin Price <griffinarloeprice@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Hi,
>
> I would like to return the product because I no longer want it.
>
> However, I'm unsure what constitutes a valid reason for a refund. Based on
> my understanding, when I purchased the product, there was a mutual
> agreement that a refund would be granted as long as the conditions outlined
> in the screenshot were met.
>
>
>
>
> It would be a bit disappointing if my refund request wasn't approved. I
> bought the product thinking I could get a refund within 30 days.
>
> Thank you
>
>

> On Wed, Jan 7, 2026, 07:01 service@simsonn.com

Hi Griffin Price,  We're sorry to hear about this unfortunate situation, but we generally cannot accept returns for products without defects. Since iron products are prone to scratches and other signs of use, we are typically unable to resell them. If your product is in perfect condition, you may return the package to our Germany warehouse. We will process your refund after receiving and inspecting the item. However, please ensure the packaging is intact and the product shows no signs of use—otherwise, your return request will not be approved! Gubitz GmbH(LeiXuan A211) Hüttenkamp 12 Neumünster,Schleswig-Holstein   24536 +49 17622233089

Hello,

Thank you. I will ensure that the packaging and product is fully in tact.
Is there a label that I can print out to ensure that the package gets to
the right location?

Thank you
